title: Spaghetti with clams
ingredients: ['1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '2 garlic cloves, chopped', '1 small fresh red chilli, seeded and chopped', '150 g (5½ oz) chestnut mushrooms, chopped', '1 can plum tomatoes, about 400 g', '1 tbsp chopped fresh basil', '1 tbsp chopped parsley', '½ tsp sugar', '340 g (12 oz) spaghetti', '48 clams in their shells, about 900 g (2 lb) in total, rinsed', '4 tbsp red or white wine']
